FAQ / Wave 1 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Team-Up Tactics

  1. I have Menasor on the field and two Team-Up Tactics in my hand. If I play them, do they do nothing, am I forced to pick one effect, or do both effects go off?
    Menasor is not a truck or a car, so Team-Up Tactics would have no effect on him.
  2. What battle cards are in the Autotbot Starter Set?
    2 x Armored Plating
    2 x Data Pad
    2 x Debilitating Crystal
    2 x Flamethrower
    2 x Grenade Launcher
    2 x Handheld Blaster
    2 x Improvised Shield
    2 x Incoming Transmission
    2 x Inspiring Leadership
    2 x Leap into Battle
    2 x New Designs
    2 x Piercing Blaster
    2 x Plasma Burst
    2 x Primary Laser
    2 x Ramming Speed
    2 x Rapid Ascent
    2 x Rapid Conversion
    2 x Ready for Action
    2 x Repair Bay
    2 x Team-Up Tactics
  3. What happens if a character is both a Truck and a Car?
    There aren’t any characters that are both a Truck and a Car.
  4. Yeah, but like, what if?
    That’s not a real question.
  5. Come on… I want to know!
    You would repair 2 damage from it and then you would draw 2 cards.
  6. When are you going to make a character that’s a Truck and a Car?
    …
